news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Medical Malpractice Law Center
news.description: Mistakes by healthcare providers can cause serious and lasting harm. A patient considering legal action should understand the basics of what this involves. The Medical Malpractice Law Center at Justia provides a useful overview.

news.title: Logic for Lawyers: Crafting Persuasive Legal Arguments
news.description: It’s in the core of your job as a lawyer to be persuasive so you may think you’ve got your legal arguments down and there’s no need for improvement, but what if you can take your good legal arguments and make them great? Don’t miss this opportunity to learn some tips and tricks to give you that winning, persuasive edge in the courtroom!

news.title: Your Bar License Is Trapped in the 20th Century. Or Is It?
news.description: Are you feeling trapped by outdated bar license rules and regulations? With the movement to change Rule of Professional Conduct (RPC) 5.5, you might finally find a way out of the hassle of navigating it all and in a new era of making your bar license as mobile as possible!
